In a coastal village, young Finn discovered his unique gift one fateful summer. While other children splashed at the shore, he dove deep, exploring coral gardens and befriending colorful fish. One day, he found a hidden cave, its walls shimmering with ancient carvings. Inside, he met Nereus, a guardian spirit of the sea, who revealed that Finn's ability was a rare blessing meant to protect the ocean. Together, they embarked on underwater adventures, learning the secrets of marine life. When a storm threatened the village, Finn used his gift to save stranded sailors, becoming a hero and a protector of the sea.
